name: Crush The Castle (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse Only
    • LMB - Click buttons
    • Mouse - Control cannonball after firing.

Objective:

  • Use your cannon to destroy defences.
    • Achieve the minimum score to progress to the next level.
    • Avoid objects that may stop you.

Credits:

  • SFX: https://freesound.org/
  • Models - Unity Store: 
    • ART GEORG - Medieval Cannon
    • MAFUBASH - Tileable Pack 01
    •  BLACK HAMMER - Fantasy Wooden GUI : Free 
    • NAYRISSA - SIMPLE FANTASY GUI
